name: LABYRINTHIUM
description:
LABYRINTHIUM: An action-adventure dungeon crawler where not all is what it seems. Find the crystals to escape the Labyrinth, but be wary, for the truth is the real key to saving your freedom.

Is a crystal really a crystal? Sometimes they like to hide...

CONTROLS:
Move: WSAD
Sprint: SHIFT
Attack: LMB
Interact: SPACE
View Map: Hold TAB

CREDITS:
